22 #include <OnixS/B3/BOE/ABI.h>
23 
24 #include <iosfwd>
25 #include <string>
26 
27 namespace OnixS {
28 namespace B3 {
29 namespace BOE {
30 
31 /// Session state ID.
32 struct SessionStateId
33 {
34  enum Enum
35  {
36  /// Session is disconnected.
37  Disconnected,
38 
39  /// Session is waiting for the `Negotiation Response` message from the exchange.
40  AwaitNegotiationResponse,
41 
42  /// Session is waiting for the `Establishment Acknowledgment` message from the exchange.
43  AwaitEstablishmentAck,
44 
45  /// Session is waiting for the confirming `Terminate` message from the exchange.
46  AwaitConfirmingTerminate,
47 
48  /// Session is fully established.
49  Established,
50 
51  /// Session is trying to restore the telecommunication link.
52  Reconnecting,
53 
54  /// Session is waiting for the message retransmission from the exchange.
55  WaitForRetransmission,
56  };
57 
58  /// \return the session state as a string.
59  ONIXS_B3_BOE_EXPORTED static const std::string& toString(Enum state);
60 };
61 
62 inline std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & o, SessionStateId::Enum state) {
63  return o << SessionStateId::toString(state);
64 }
65 
66 }
67 }
68 }
